mapper.sql: SELECT m_crm_task.id, m_crm_task.subject, 'Crm-Task' as eventType, m_crm_task.startdate, m_crm_task.duedate as endDate, m_crm_task.typeId, m_crm_task.description, m_crm_task.createdTime, m_crm_task.createdUser, m_crm_task.sAccountId, m_crm_task.status, m_crm_task.assignUser, m_crm_task.type, 'Error' as typeName, m_crm_task.lastUpdatedTime, LTRIM(concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname)) as assignUserFullName, m_crm_task.priority as priority, LTRIM(concat(m_crm_contact.firstname,' ',m_crm_contact.lastname)) as contactFullName, m_crm_task.contactId as contactId, null as callDuration, null as callPurpose, null as callResult, null as meetingLocation, s_user.avatarId as assignUserAvatarId FROM m_crm_task LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON m_crm_task.assignUser = s_user.username LEFT OUTER JOIN m_crm_contact ON m_crm_task.contactId = m_crm_contact.id

SELECT m_crm_call.id, m_crm_call.subject, 'Crm-Call' as eventType, m_crm_call.startdate, m_crm_call.startdate as endDate, m_crm_call.typeId, m_crm_call.description, m_crm_call.createdTime, m_crm_call.createdUser, m_crm_call.sAccountId, m_crm_call.status, m_crm_call.assignUser, m_crm_call.type, 'Error' as typeName, m_crm_call.lastUpdatedTime, LTRIM(concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname)) as assignUserFullName, null as priority , null as contactFullName , null as contactId,m_crm_call.durationInSeconds as callDuration, m_crm_call.purpose as callPurpose, m_crm_call.result as callResult,null as meetingLocation,s_user.avatarId as assignUserAvatarId FROM m_crm_call LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON m_crm_call.assignUser = s_user.username

SELECT m_crm_meeting.id, m_crm_meeting.subject, 'Crm-Meeting' as eventType, m_crm_meeting.startdate, m_crm_meeting.endDate, m_crm_meeting.typeId, m_crm_meeting.description, m_crm_meeting.createdTime, m_crm_meeting.createdUser, m_crm_meeting.sAccountId, m_crm_meeting.status, m_crm_meeting.createdUser as assignUser, m_crm_meeting.type, 'Error' as typeName, m_crm_meeting.lastUpdatedTime, LTRIM(concat(s_user.firstname, LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname)) as assignUserFullName, null as priority,null as contactFullName,null as contactId,null as callDuration, null as callPurpose, null as callResult, m_crm_meeting.location as meetingLocation,s_user.avatarId as assignUserAvatarId FROM m_crm_meeting LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON m_crm_meeting.createdUser = s_user.username
